errors.default: Something bad happened. Please try again later or contact the system owner.
errors.network: Network error. Please re-check your internet connection and try again.
errors.transaction: Transaction error. Please try again later or contact the system owner.
errors.blockchain-event-type: We should not get here, unhandled { type }

validation.field-error_minLength: This field must contain a minimum of { minLength } symbols
validation.field-error_maxLength: This field must contain a maximum of { maxLength } symbols
validation.field-error_alphaNum: The value must consist of alphanumeric values (A-Z, a-z, 0-9)
validation.field-error_alpha: The value must consist of alphabetic characters (A-Z, a-z)
validation.field-error_uniqueValue: The value is not unique, try another
validation.field-error_email: This field must be a valid email
validation.field-error_phone: This field must be a valid phone number.
validation.field-error_blockIdent: This field must be valid block hash or block number
validation.field-error_mnemonicSed: The value must be mnemonic seed
validation.field-error_hexSeed: The value must be in hex format and consist of { length } characters.
validation.field-error_amountRange: Amount should be in the range from { from } to { to }

messages.council-motion: Voting ends on council motion { id }
messages.democracy-dispatch: Enactment of the result of referendum { id }
messages.democracy-launch: Start of the next referendum voting period
messages.parachain-auction: End of the current parachain auction { id }
messages.parachain-lease: Start of the next parachain lease period { id }
messages.referendum-dispatch: Potential dispatch of referendum { id } (if passed)
messages.staking-epoch: Start of a new staking session { id }
messages.staking-era: Start of a new staking era { id }
messages.staking-slash: Application of slashes from era { id }
messages.society-challenge: Start of next membership challenge period
messages.society-rotate: Acceptance of new members and bids
